name: Infused Viral Compiler
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ All parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum. You will need to build an Ancient Engineering Device as well if you do not have one already. A link to this tradeskill process is included #L "Dormant Ancient Circuit" "267794" #L "Viral Compiler" "251223" #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "267751" Note:To build your Ancient Engineering Device, go here: #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "/tell recipe 594" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ancient Engineering Device + Dormant Ancient Circuit = #L "Active Ancient Circuit" "267795" Skills: | 1500 ME | Active Ancient Circuit + Viral Compiler = #L "Infused Viral Compiler" "267913" Skills: | 6X QL in ME |
